statusCodeSubHeader.400: Server could not understand the request because of invalid syntax
statusCodeSubHeader.402: Reserved for future use to be implemented in digital payment systems
statusCodeSubHeader.403: Forbidden! Client does not have rights to access the content
statusCodeSubHeader.405: Requested method is not allowed and cannot be used
statusCodeSubHeader.406: Server does not find any content following the criteria given by the user agent
statusCodeSubHeader.407: Client must be authenticated by a proxy
statusCodeSubHeader.408: Server did not receive a complete request in the time that it prepared to wait
statusCodeSubHeader.409: Request could not be fulfilled due to a conflict with the current state of the target source
statusCodeSubHeader.410: Requested resource has been deleted and the condition seems to be permanent
statusCodeSubHeader.411: Server rejected the request because it requires the Content-Length header field to be defined
statusCodeSubHeader.412: Server does not meet one or multiple preconditions that were indicated in the request header fields
statusCodeSubHeader.413: Server refuses to process the request because the request payload is larger than the server is able or willing to process
statusCodeSubHeader.414: Server is refusing to service the request because the request-target was longer than the server was willing to interpret
statusCodeSubHeader.415: Server is rejecting the request because it does not support the media format of the requested data
statusCodeSubHeader.416: Server is rejecting the request because the range header field of the request can't be fulfilled
statusCodeSubHeader.417: Expect request-header field could not be met by the server
statusCodeSubHeader.421: Request is directed at a server that is not configured to produce a response
statusCodeSubHeader.422: Server unable to follow the request due to semantic errors
statusCodeSubHeader.423: Access to the request resource is being locked
statusCodeSubHeader.424: Request failed due to the failure of a previous request
statusCodeSubHeader.425: Server is not willing to risk processing a request that might be replayed
statusCodeSubHeader.426: Server refuses to perform the given request using the current protocol
statusCodeSubHeader.428: Server requires the request to be conditional
statusCodeSubHeader.429: User has sent too many requests
statusCodeSubHeader.431: Server is not willing to process the request because its header fields are indeed too large
statusCodeSubHeader.451: User has requested an illegal resource
statusCodeSubHeader.500: Server has encountered a situation that it does not know how to handle
statusCodeSubHeader.501: Request can not be handled because it is not supported by the server
statusCodeSubHeader.502: Server received an invalid response while working as a gateway to handle the response
statusCodeSubHeader.503: Server is currently not ready to handle the request
statusCodeSubHeader.504: Server acting as a gateway could not get a response time
statusCodeSubHeader.505: Version of HTTP used in the request is not supported by the server
statusCodeSubHeader.506: Server has internal configuration error: chosen variant resource is configured to managing transparent negotiation
statusCodeSubHeader.507: Method could not be performed on the resource because the server is not able to store the representation that would be needed to complete the request successfully
statusCodeSubHeader.508: Server has detected an infinite loop while processing the request
statusCodeSubHeader.510: Further extensions are required for the server to be able to fulfil the request
statusCodeSubHeader.511: Client needs to authenticate to gain network access
